alert.note: Alert for Osborne; Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 7:14PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT ROOKS AND OSBORNE COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM CDT... At 714 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms centered along a line extending from near Zurich to 7 miles south of Alton. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Plainville, Osborne, Stockton, Natoma, Palco, Woodston, Damar, Alton, Portis, Zurich, Codell, and Webster State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
